long_description:
# NodeCore Heaters
Just a little mod I wrote to add flameless heaters to NodeCore.
# Known bugs
Heaters are powered by being adjacent to an active lens, but the lens doesn't have to be pointed at it.
name: nneett_nc_heaters
short_description: Just a little mod I wrote to add a flameless heater.
title: NodeCore Heaters
